special.name: Slow Time
special.desc: Slows all target movement by 80% while Pistol shot shoots 50% faster for 15 seconds.

levels.desc: Shoots 3 projectiles forward. Horizontal only.
Shoot 1 additional shot, and each bullet can pierce +1 times.
Increase damage by 25%.
Bullets ricochet if hit limit is reached.
Each bullet can pierce +1 times. Reduce the time between attacks by 25%.
Increase damage by 40%.
Shoot 2 additional shots, and postol becomes spread type.
Weapons deal 15% more damage.
Weapons deal 25% more damage.
Weapons deal 35% more damage and fire 10% faster.
Gain a dog companion that attacks random targets, dealing 100% of your base damage per hit.
Gain a dog companion that attacks random targets, dealing 150% of your base damage per hit.
Gain a dog companion that attacks random targets, dealing 200% of your base damage per hit and stuns targets for 2 seconds on hit.
Increases critical hit chance by 10%.
Increases critical hit chance by 20%.
Increases critical hit chance by 30% with a 2% chance to defeat a target in 1 hit.

special.name: Shark Call
special.desc: Summon a shark that deals 500% damage to all targets around. Gura turns red, increasing ATK by 50% and SPD by 25% for 15 seconds.

levels.desc: Mid ranged stab attack in front.
Increase damage by 20%.
Stab one extra time, forming a V shape.
Reduce the time between attacks by 15%.
Increase damage by 40%.
Increase attack area by 25%.
Thrust 3 times, in a fork-like shape.
Grants a 15% chance to dodge an attack. After dodging, increase movement speed by 30% and stay invulnerable for 0.5 second.
Grants a 25% chance to dodge an attack. After dodging, increase movement speed by 40% and stay invulnerable for 0.5 second.
Grants a 35% chance to dodge an attack. After dodging, increase movement speed by 50% and stay invulnerable for 0.5 second.
Attacks have a 10% chance to place 1 'Bite Mark' (max 5). Per stack, target takes 6% more damage and a 20% chance to heal you 1% when defeated.
Attacks have a 15% chance to place 1 'Bite Mark' (max 5). Per stack, target takes 9% more damage and a 20% chance to heal you 1% when defeated.
Attacks have a 120% chance to place 1 'Bite Mark' (max 5). Per stack, target takes 12% more damage and a 20% chance to heal you 1% when defeated.
Every 10 seconds, create a whirlpool that draws in targets and takes 15% more damage, lasting 6 seconds.
Every 10 seconds, create a whirlpool that draws in targets and takes 30% more damage, lasting 6 seconds.
Every 10 seconds, create a whirlpool that draws in targets and takes 50% more damage, lasting 6 seconds and deal 50% damage every 0.5 seconds.

special.name: Tako Spin
special.desc: Summons 8 tentacles around Ina, then spins rapidly around her, dealing 150% damage and knockback to all targets.

levels.desc: A tentacle shoots out in front.
Increase damage by 20%.
Reduce the time between attacks by 20%.
Increase attack area by 25%.
Increase damage by 50%.
Adds small knockback on hit.
Chain another tentacle in a chain at a random direction.
For every target within 150px, increase ATK by 5% up to 50%.
For every target within 150px, increase ATK by 7.5% up to 75%.
For every target within 150px, increase ATK by 10% up to 100%.
Summon AO. Every 5 seconds, AO creates a zone with a 30% chance to convert targets to Harmless Takodachis.
Summon AO. Every 5 seconds, AO creates a zone with a 40% chance to convert targets to Harmless Takodachis.
Summon AO. Every 5 seconds, AO creates a zone with a 50% chance to convert targets to Harmless Takodachis. Harmless Takodachis heal Ina 1% HP.
Targets within 75px moves slower by 20%.
Targets within 100px moves slower by 25%.
Targets within 125px moves slower by 30% and also takes 75% damage ever 2 second.

special.name: Phoenix Fire
special.desc: Explode with a big burst of flames, dealing 600% damage and creating a ring of fire around her that deals 50% damage per hit.

levels.desc: Short ranged slash in front.
Increase damage by 20%.
Increase attack area by 25%.
Reduce the time between attacks by 15%.
Can hit twice per slash.
Increase damage by 20%.
Sword is engulfed in flames, and cat hit many times.
Moving gradually increases damage by 2% every second, up to 40%. Buff resets to 0% if stopped.
Moving gradually increases damage by 3% every second, up to 60%. Buff resets to 0% if stopped.
Moving gradually increases damage by 4% every second, up to 80%. Also increase critical hit chance by 1% per stack.  Buff resets to 0% if stopped.
Leave a burning fire underneath Kiara whenever she moves that deals 30% damage per hit. Lasts 5 seconds.
Leave a burning fire underneath Kiara whenever she moves that deals 50% damage per hit. Lasts 5 seconds.
Leave a burning fire underneath Kiara whenever she moves that deals 75% damage per hit. Lasts 5 seconds. Also slows targets for 3 seconds.
If Kiara has not taken any damage for 10 seconds, the next damage taken is halved and stay invulnerable for 0.5 seconds.
If Kiara has not taken any damage for 10 seconds, the next two hits taken is halved and stay invulnerable for 0.5 seconds.
If Kiara has not taken any damage for 10 seconds, the next three hits taken is halved and stay invulnerable for 1 seconds.

special.name: The Reaper
special.desc: Temporarily buff self to increase scythe damage by 300% and increase damage of all critical hits to 300% for 15 seconds.

levels.desc: Swings in a half circle arc in front.
Increase damage by 20%.
Increase attack area by 20%.
Increase damage by 30%.
Reduce the time between attacks by 10%.
Increase attack area by 20%.
Increase damage by 40%. Has a 7% chance to instant KO.
When defeating a target with Scythe Swing or Death, there is a 20% chance to create an explosion for 60% damage, and a 5% chance to KO.
When defeating a target with Scythe Swing or Death, there is a 25% chance to create an explosion for 90% damage, and a 8% chance to KO.
When defeating a target with Scythe Swing or Death, there is a 30% chance to create an explosion for 120% damage, and a 10% chance to KO.
For each target defeated, increase ATK by 3% for 5 seconds up to 60%. Refreshes duration on each target defeated.
For each target defeated, increase ATK by 4% for 5 seconds up to 80%. Refreshes duration on each target defeated.
For each target defeated, increase ATK by 5% for 5 seconds up to 100%, and SPD by 2% up to 40%. Refreshes duration on each target defeated.
Targets within 100px take 20% extra damage.
Targets within 125px take 30% extra damage.
Targets within 150px take 40% extra damage and an additional 10% of being a critical hit.

special.name: Absolute Chaos
special.desc: Launch all current weapons with zero delay for 5 seconds.

levels.desc: Throw out a die. The number on the die determines the damage.
Increase damage by 30%
Throw 2 dice.
Dice shoots out farther, and increase area of attack by 30%.
Adds small knockback on hit.
Increase damage by 30%.
Throw 3 dice.
Critical hits will roll the same percentage chance again to deal an extended critical hit, dealing 2 times damage.
Critical hits will roll the same percentage chance again to deal an extended critical hit, dealing 3 times damage.
Critical hits will roll the same percentage chance again to deal an extended critical hit, dealing 4 times damage.
Attacks have a 10% chance to cause the target to be upside down for 2 seconds. While upside down, the target can't move.
Attacks have a 15% chance to cause the target to be upside down for 2 seconds. While upside down, the target can't move.
Attacks have a 20% chance to cause the target to be upside down for 2 seconds. While upside down, the target can't move and take extra 20% damage.
Reduce all attack damage by 15%, but increase Crit Chance by 30%.
Reduce all attack damage by 7%, but increase Crit Chance by 30%.
Increase Crit Chance by 30%.

special.name: Ruler of Time
special.desc: Every second, emit a time blast that deals damage. Each second, the emitted blast becomes stronger.

levels.desc: Stab forward with a large clock hand and at a random target with the smaller clock hand.
Increase area of attack by 20%.
Increase damage by 30%.
Reduce the time between attack by 10%.
Increase area of attack by 30%.
Reduce time between attack by 15%.
Increase damage by 50% and stun targets for 0.5 seconds.
Increase SPD and Haste by 10%. If Clock Hands lands a critical hit, gain another 10% to SPD and Haste for 5 seconds.
Increase SPD and Haste by 10%. If Clock Hands lands a critical hit, gain another 15% to SPD and Haste for 5 seconds.
Increase SPD and Haste by 10%. If Clock Hands lands a critical hit, gain another 20% to SPD and Haste for 5 seconds.
Every 10 seconds, create a small time bubble that freezes targets in time, preventing them from moving or attacking.
Every 10 seconds, create a medium time bubble that freezes targets in time, preventing them from moving or attacking.
Every 10 seconds, create a large time bubble that freezes targets in time, preventing them from moving or attacking.
While HP is full, increase ATK, SPD, PickUp by 20%. Also increase Haste and Crit by 10%.
While HP is full, increase ATK, SPD, PickUp by 33%. Also increase Haste and Crit by 15%.
While HP is full, increase ATK, SPD, PickUp by 50%. Also increase Haste and Crit by 20%.

special.name: Mother Nature
special.desc: Summon a giant tree that creates a healing zone. IN this zone, Fauna gains a 10 second invicibility buff.

levels.desc: Create 3 razor sharp leaves that spiral outward.
Increase damage by 20% and increase hit limit by 5.
Reduce the time between attacks by 15%.
Shoot 2 additional leaves.
Increase area of attack by 30% and increase hit limit by 5.
Increase damage by 30% and remove hit limit.
Shoot 2 additional leaves and aim towards targets.
When defeating a target, there is a 5% chance that a sapling will drop. A sapling heals 3% and increase Fauna's ATK, SPD by 30% for 10 seconds.
When defeating a target, there is a 7% chance that a sapling will drop. A sapling heals 3% and increase Fauna's ATK, SPD by 40% for 10 seconds.
When defeating a target, there is a 10% chance that a sapling will drop. A sapling heals 3% and increase Fauna's ATK, SPD by 50% for 10 seconds.
When healing, a branch will grow under a random nearby target dealing 200% damage.
When healing, a branch will grow under a random nearby target dealing 250% damage.
When healing, a branch will grow under a random nearby target dealing 300% damage.
Every 10 seconds, gain 1 "Whisped" (max 3). Each stack heals 2% HP every seconds. On taking the next hit, consume 1 Whisper to negate the attack.
Every 10 seconds, gain 1 "Whisped" (max 4). Each stack heals 2% HP every seconds. On taking the next hit, consume 1 Whisper to negate the attack.
Every 10 seconds, gain 1 "Whisped" (max 5). Each stack heals 2% HP every seconds. On taking the next hit, consume 1 Whisper to negate the attack.

special.name: True Horror
special.desc: Destroy everything in sight (except for bosses). There is a 30% that drops are not deleted.

levels.desc: Shoot a bunch of feathers at a speard. Pierces through targets.
Increase damage by 20%.
Increase hit limit by 5.
Shoot 1 additional feather.
Reduce the time between attacks by 30% and increase hit limit by 5.
Shoot 2 additional feather.
Feathers home into targets 3 times.
Summon a Friend that usesone of you weapons at random every 5 seconds at 80% power.
Summon a Friend that usesone of you weapons at random every 5 seconds at 100% power.
Summon a Friend that usesone of you weapons at random every 5 seconds at 120% power.
For every 50 targets Mumei has defeated, increase damage by 1% (max 100%).
For every 50 targets Mumei has defeated, increase damage by 1% (max 150%).
For every 50 targets Mumei has defeated, increase damage by 1% (max 200%).
Attack increases by 1% for every target currently on the screen, up to 100%.
Attack increases by 2% for every target currently on the screen, up to 120%.
Attack increases by 3% for every target currently on the screen, up to 150%.

special.name: Become Beeg
special.desc: Become a Beeg version for 10 seconds. While Beeg, Sana is invincible to all attacks, and deal 200% damage to all targets that touch her.

levels.desc: Create an orbitting planet. Hits multiple targets.
Increase damage by 20%.
Increase area of attack by 20% and range by 20%.
Increase damage by 33%.
Increase area of attack by 30% and range by 30%.
Reduce the time between attacks by 10%.
Create a second planet and knock back targets.
Area and all attacks damage increase by 10%. All attack damage is also increased by area increasing effects.
Area and all attacks damage increase by 20%. All attack damage is also increased by area increasing effects.
Area and all attacks damage increase by 30%. All attack damage is also increased by area increasing effects.
Every 15 seconds, gain a 15 seconds 20% buff to either ATK, SPD, Crit, Pickup Range, or Haste, or heal for 30% HP.
Every 15 seconds, gain a 15 seconds 30% buff to either ATK, SPD, Crit, Pickup Range, or Haste, or heal for 40% HP.
Every 15 seconds, gain a 15 seconds 40% buff to either ATK, SPD, Crit, Pickup Range, or Haste, or heal for 50% HP.
Every 5 seconds, create a gravitational blast that deals 125% damage. Damage is also increased by area increasing effects.
Every 5 seconds, create a gravitational blast that deals 150% damage. Damage is also increased by area increasing effects.
Every 5 seconds, create a gravitational blast that deals 200% damage. Damage is also increased by area increasing effects.

special.name: Hope is Descending
special.desc: Hope descends from top of screen, and then explodes for 250% damage.

levels.desc: Shoots dual light and dark blast.
Increase damage by 20%
Increase attack area by 50%. Each blast can pierce +3 times.
Reduce the time between attacks by 25%.
Can pierce through targets.
Increase damage by 33%.
Blast becomes a short beam that hits many times.
When landing a critical hit on a target, there is a 10% chance to heal 1 HP. There is a 0.3 second cooldown between each heal.
When landing a critical hit on a target, there is a 15% chance to heal 2 HP. There is a 0.3 second cooldown between each heal.
When landing a critical hit on a target, there is a 20% chance to heal 3 HP. There is a 0.3 second cooldown between each heal.
Increase damage by 3%, up to 30%, for 5 seconds every time Irys heals. Each heal resets the timer.
Increase damage by 4%, up to 40%, for 5 seconds every time Irys heals. Each heal resets the timer.
Increase damage by 5%, up to 50%, for 5 seconds every time Irys heals. Each heal resets the timer.
Upon being hit, there is a 20% chance to heal 15% HP.
Upon being hit, there is a 25% chance to heal 20% HP.
